**PLEASE MAKE SURE TO DOWNLOAD NPM (WHICH ALSO CREATES "PACKAGE_LOCK.JSON" FOLDER.

CODE FOR INSTALLING NPM MODULES IS: "NPM INSTALL --SAVE EXPRESS".

THIS WILL INSTALL ALL CONTENT IN "NODE_MODULES" FOLDER, ALONG WITH FOLDER "PACKAGE_LOCK.JSON" AND ITS CONTENTS.

THIS SHOULD BE THE FIRST STEP, BEFORE CREATING "SERVER.JS".
